name: Andy
description:
Andy is a game about feeling like a kid and solving puzzles.

Producer & Programming - Guillermo Larrosa @FredGreen182

Art - Giuliana Rodriguez /greypanda.art

Art - Nicolas Farinasso /nicofari.art

Programming - Mauricio Figueira @mauri_up

Music & SFX - Nicolas Balerio /nico_balerio
